Ideas/motivation by DQ staff :)

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

This does look nice, I think we should encourage all development in any direction, no-one is going to force people to branch off and people are always going to stick around with the more conventional stuff.

Who knows, we may even develop some really good original stuff, lawl.

Read full topic

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @revengeofalev revengeofalev
item.description:
@revengeofalev wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:74, topic:205094”][quote author=Peter link=topic=270735.msg2223348#msg2223348 date=1210671071]

[quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=270735.msg2223174#msg2223174 date=1210660457]

[quote author=alexlevinson link=topic=270735.msg2222874#msg2222874 date=1210649125]

Wouldnt it be better if you simply created your own game instead?

You’ve got the intelligence of a brick. RSC DOESNT HAVE MANA.
[/quote]Its RSC, and its meant to stay RSC.[/quote]

It’s the exact narrow-mindedness that shouldn’t be around RSC development. RSC was never finished, the development of it just stopped. Anyways, could someone clean up this useless spam (including Alex’s posts)?
[/quote]Yeah, guess I implied my intentions the wrong way. Whatever, argument over, and the idiots have been identified. Good luck with your project.[/quote]

Deal. Now stop muting me. Re-registering is annoying.
[center] No. You broke the rules. Now that you made multiple accounts, another rule, I really should ban your IP address. A mute is a mute, wait it out.[/center]

Read full topic

item.description:

im using the word Advanced because compared to all the other servers around at the moment, this is obviously further and therefore advanced.

What’s so hard about getting RSCD V25 going? =\ Only took a few minutes, and some missing client-related files. :P[/quote]

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @Zero187 Zero187
item.description:
@Zero187 wrote:

No point in arguing any further about this. We are looking for as much CONSTRUCTIVE criticism as possible. If you simply want to tell us not to make the game, you might as well save your fingers the trouble of typing because we are going to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“Zero187, post:60, topic:205094”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=270735.msg2223275#msg2223275 date=1210666364]

[quote author=alexlevinson link=topic=270735.msg2223241#msg2223241 date=1210664176]

Wouldnt it be better if you simply created your own game instead?

You’ve got the intelligence of a brick. RSC DOESNT HAVE MANA.
[/quote]You sir, are an idiot. What’s the point of going around and modifying RSC to the extent of looking like a whole new game. Its RSC, and its meant to stay RSC. If you want mana or mana bar’s, or whatever they are, create your own game.

That’s like saying whats the point to making an online message board when your just using PunBB and modding it? This is a very stupid point your trying to make. Why not just say there’s no point in using PHP when you can write your own scripting language. Hell, lets just re-write the Windows Kernel while were at it! That’ll be GREAT!
[/quote]Sure, do that. But that’s not my point. You are obviously missing it and I am not entitled to elaborate more on it, as it was easy enough to understand in the first place. Thiefmn6092 understands, and so can you.

TeleNubby, we are entitled to modifying the game how we please (why would we want to start over with a fresh game, when we can use an already developed successful game?) and we aren’t entitled to elaborate any further either. If you don’t like it, don’t play it. No point in trying to shut it down just because you don’t like the idea of one or two things we are changing. Change isn’t a bad thing, and you should be happy that there are many people developing RSC further to keep it alive and fun. How much would it suck if there were no developers at all? If you are a moderator, you should be a little bit more respectable towards others.[/quote]I am not trying to shut it down. I was simply stating my opinion, then backed it up with my reasoning in another post, and you guys got all defensive. Calm down.

Read full topic

oh, and newfags can’t green.
that is all for now.[quote=“Zero187, post:60, topic:205094”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=270735.msg2223275#msg2223275 date=1210666364]

[quote author=alexlevinson link=topic=270735.msg2223241#msg2223241 date=1210664176]

Wouldnt it be better if you simply created your own game instead?

You’ve got the intelligence of a brick. RSC DOESNT HAVE MANA.
[/quote]You sir, are an idiot. What’s the point of going around and modifying RSC to the extent of looking like a whole new game. Its RSC, and its meant to stay RSC. If you want mana or mana bar’s, or whatever they are, create your own game.

That’s like saying whats the point to making an online message board when your just using PunBB and modding it? This is a very stupid point your trying to make. Why not just say there’s no point in using PHP when you can write your own scripting language. Hell, lets just re-write the Windows Kernel while were at it! That’ll be GREAT!
[/quote]Sure, do that. But that’s not my point. You are obviously missing it and I am not entitled to elaborate more on it, as it was easy enough to understand in the first place. Thiefmn6092 understands, and so can you.

TeleNubby, we are entitled to modifying the game how we please (why would we want to start over with a fresh game, when we can use an already developed successful game?) and we aren’t entitled to elaborate any further either. If you don’t like it, don’t play it. No point in trying to shut it down just because you don’t like the idea of one or two things we are changing. Change isn’t a bad thing, and you should be happy that there are many people developing RSC further to keep it alive and fun. How much would it suck if there were no developers at all? If you are a moderator, you should be a little bit more respectable towards others.[/quote]
He’s pretty much right. You’re pretty much a tool box, mod. I wouldn’t let you suck my dick for all the cocaine in columbia. No joke.

Read full topic

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @Zero187 Zero187
item.description:
@Zero187 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:56, topic:205094”][quote author=alexlevinson link=topic=270735.msg2223241#msg2223241 date=1210664176]

[quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=270735.msg2223174#msg2223174 date=1210660457]

Wouldnt it be better if you simply created your own game instead?

You’ve got the intelligence of a brick. RSC DOESNT HAVE MANA.
[/quote]You sir, are an idiot. What’s the point of going around and modifying RSC to the extent of looking like a whole new game. Its RSC, and its meant to stay RSC. If you want mana or mana bar’s, or whatever they are, create your own game.

That’s like saying whats the point to making an online message board when your just using PunBB and modding it? This is a very stupid point your trying to make. Why not just say there’s no point in using PHP when you can write your own scripting language. Hell, lets just re-write the Windows Kernel while were at it! That’ll be GREAT!
[/quote]Sure, do that. But that’s not my point. You are obviously missing it and I am not entitled to elaborate more on it, as it was easy enough to understand in the first place. Thiefmn6092 understands, and so can you.[/quote]
TeleNubby, we are entitled to modifying the game how we please (why would we want to start over with a fresh game, when we can use an already developed successful game?) and we aren’t entitled to elaborate any further either. If you don’t like it, don’t play it. No point in trying to shut it down just because you don’t like the idea of one or two things we are changing. Change isn’t a bad thing, and you should be happy that there are many people developing RSC further to keep it alive and fun. How much would it suck if there were no developers at all? If you are a moderator, you should be a little bit more respectable towards others.

Read full topic

item.title: Something a bit original
item.dc:creator: @alexlevinson alexlevinson
item.description:
@alexlevinson wrote:

Just because the fag pair of a lame moderator and a fake ass TARC wannabe claim something, doesn’t mean its worth anymore than the shit that comes out my ass crack. In fact, my shit is probably worth more than the pompous argument you two cum buckets are attempting to make.

A little piece of advice, listen to the people on this board. They know the truth. Neither of you two do anything except talk shit and use the heavy hand of a moderator status to act supreme. This forum had free reign and was ok before you dicks stepped up and tried to pull the rank card on us. Kindly go back to the shit hole RS2 Dev. Forum you crawled out of.
[center] Quit crying. We are giving you our thoughts and opinions. There is no need for you to come out bitching about it. The only reason you’re talking about how great the RSC Section was is because it was not moderated enough to shut idiots like you up. Please, take some time and take in what you’re reading, as it will help you plenty in the future.[/center]

Read full topic
